button.Name: Close

Textentry.name: Prefix
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field is to specify the prefix to use for your salvage bookmarks. Any bookmark which starts with this prefix will be used as a salvage location."]

Checkbox.name: AvoidShips
Checkbox.Text: Don't salvage when any non-fleet ships are on grid
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["When this option is checked, ComBot will skip a belt if there are non-fleet ships present."]

Checkbox.name: Relay
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["When this option is checked, ComBot will relay bookmark removals. Use this when you are in a corporation which only allows you to remove your own bookmarks. ComBot will give other sessions instructions to remove bookmarks when it is finished salvaging."]

Textentry.Name: BeltPatrolBookmark
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of a bookmark in the system in which you would like to belt salvage when no salvage prefix bookmarks are available."]

listbox.Name: BeltPatrolBookmarkList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of a bookmark in the system in which you would like to belt salvage when no salvage prefix bookmarks are available."]

Checkbox.name: BeltPatrol
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["Enable this option if you would like ComBot to cycle through belts salvaging when there are no salvage prefix bookmarks available."]

Combobox.name: Size
Combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This selection can be used to specify what wreck sizes to salvage. Anything smaller than your selection will be ignored. For example, choosing Small will salvage everything, but choosing Medium will only salvage Medium and Large wrecks."]

Checkbox.name: FollowGates
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["When this option is checked, ComBot will follow gates to continue salvaging from the same player as long as there are more bookmarks available from that player. If there are not, ComBot will assume the next pocket in a deadspace chain still contains NPCs and skip to a different bookmark creator."]

Textentry.Name: Dropoff
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact bookmark for the station in which you would like to drop off salvage loot."]

listbox.Name: DropoffList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact bookmark for the station in which you would like to drop off salvage loot."]

TextEntry.name: Dropoff_Container
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your dropoff location. If you are delivering to an Fleet Hangar, this needs to contain the name of the pilot flying your Fleet Hangar. If you are delivering to a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name. This field is also used to specify the prefix for corporate bookmarks created using the Corporate Jetcan mode."]

listbox.Name: DropoffSubType
listbox.OnLoad: switch ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config.DropoffType} { case Corporation Hangar This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break case Container This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] This:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] break } This.ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

listbox.Name: DropoffType
listbox.OnSelect: Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config:SetDropoffType[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:ClearItems switch ${This.SelectedItem.Text} { case Corporation Hangar UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager].ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Corporate Folder] UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config:SetDropoffContainer[\"\"] UIElement[DropoffTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Station Bookmark] break case Container UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 1] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 2] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 3] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 4] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 5] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 6] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:AddItem[Corporation Folder 7] UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager].ItemByText["${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config.DropoffSubType}"]:Select UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Corporate Folder] UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Container Name] UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[DropoffTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Container Bookmark] break case Fleet Hangar UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Fleet Hangar Pilot Name] UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide UIElement[DropoffTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Mining System Bookmark] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config:SetDropoffSubType[\"\"] case Personal Hangar UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide UIElement[DropoffSubType@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config:SetDropoffSubType[\"\"] UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide UIElement[Dropoff_ContainerTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:Hide Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config:SetDropoffContainer[\"\"] UIElement[DropoffTitle@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[Station Bookmark] } UIElement[Dropoff_Container@DropoffFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Salvager.Config.DropoffContainer}]
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager_Frame@ComBot_DedicatedSalvager]:SetText["Use this field to configure where you would like ComBot to unload salvage loot."]
